 2471: simple_sync_get3() ->
 2472:     [{doc, "Simple sync get-request - Version 3 API (TargetName and send-opts)"}].
 2473: 
 2474: simple_sync_get3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2475:     ?TC_TRY(simple_sync_get3,
 2476:             fun() -> do_simple_sync_get3(Config) end).
 2477: 
 2478: do_simple_sync_get3(Config) ->
 2479:     ?IPRINT("starting with Config: "
 2480:             "~n      ~p", [Config]),
 2481:     Self  = self(), 
 2482:     Msg   = simple_sync_get3, 
 2483:     Fun   = fun() -> Self ! Msg end,
 2484:     Extra = {?SNMPM_EXTRA_INFO_TAG, Fun}, 
 2485:     SendOpts = 
 2486: 	[
 2487: 	 {extra, Extra}
 2488: 	], 
 2489:     Get = fun(Node, TargetName, Oids) -> 
 2490: 		  mgr_user_sync_get2(Node, TargetName, Oids, SendOpts) 
 2491: 	  end,
 2492:     PostVerify = 
 2493: 	fun() ->
 2494: 		receive
 2495: 		    Msg ->
 2496: 			ok
 2497: 		end
 2498: 	end,
 2499:     Res = do_simple_sync_get3(Config, Get, PostVerify),
 2500:     display_log(Config),
 2501:     Res.
 2502: 
 2503: 
 2504: do_simple_sync_get3(Config, Get, PostVerify) ->
 2505:     ?IPRINT("starting with Config: "
 2506:             "~n      ~p", [Config]),
 2507: 
 2508:     Node       = ?config(manager_node, Config),
 2509:     TargetName = ?config(manager_agent_target_name, Config),
 2510: 
 2511:     ?IPRINT("issue get-request without loading the mib"),
 2512:     Oids1 = [?sysObjectID_instance, ?sysDescr_instance, ?sysUpTime_instance],
 2513:     ok = do_simple_sync_get3(Node, TargetName, Oids1, Get, PostVerify),
 2514: 
 2515:     ?IPRINT("issue get-request after first loading the mibs"),
 2516:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(Node, std_mib()),
 2517:     Oids2 = [[sysObjectID, 0], [sysDescr, 0], [sysUpTime, 0]],
 2518:     ok = do_simple_sync_get3(Node, TargetName, Oids2, Get, PostVerify),
 2519:     ok.
 2520: 
 2521: do_simple_sync_get3(Node, TargetName, Oids, Get, PostVerify) 
 2522:   when is_function(Get, 3) andalso is_function(PostVerify, 0) ->
 2523: 
 2524:     ?IPRINT("try get for ~p (on ~p):"
 2525:             "~n      Oids: ~p", [TargetName, Node, Oids]),
 2526:     Reply =
 2527:         case Get(Node, TargetName, Oids) of
 2528:             {ok, R, _Rem} ->
 2529:                 ?IPRINT("get reply: "
 2530:                         "~n       Reply: ~p"
 2531:                         "~n       Rem:   ~w", [R, _Rem]),
 2532: 
 2533:                 R;
 2534:             {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 2535:                 ?EPRINT("get failed: "
 2536:                         "~n      ~p", [Reason]),
 2537:                 ERROR
 2538:         end,
 2539: 
 2540:     %% verify that the operation actually worked:
 2541:     %% The order should be the same, so no need to search
 2542:     ok = case Reply of
 2543: 		   {noError, 0, [#varbind{oid   = ?sysObjectID_instance,
 2544: 					  value = SysObjectID}, 
 2545: 				 #varbind{oid   = ?sysDescr_instance,
 2546: 					  value = SysDescr},
 2547: 				 #varbind{oid   = ?sysUpTime_instance,
 2548: 					  value = SysUpTime}]} ->
 2549: 		       ?IPRINT("expected result from get: "
 2550:                                "~n   SysObjectID: ~p"
 2551:                                "~n   SysDescr:    ~s"
 2552:                                "~n   SysUpTime:   ~w", 
 2553:                                [SysObjectID, SysDescr, SysUpTime]),
 2554: 		       PostVerify();
 2555: 		   {noError, 0, Vbs} ->
 2556: 		       ?EPRINT("unexpected varbinds: "
 2557:                                "~n      ~p", [Vbs]),
 2558: 		       {error, {unexpected_vbs, Vbs}};
 2559: 		   Else ->
 2560: 		       ?EPRINT("unexpected reply: "
 2561:                                "~n      ~p", [Else]),
 2562: 		       {error, {unexpected_response, Else}}
 2563: 	       end,
 2564:     ok.
 2565: 
 2566: 
 2567: %%======================================================================
 2568: 
 2569: sag_verify({noError, 0, _Vbs}, any) ->
 2570:     ?IPRINT("verified [any]"),
 2571:     ok;
 2572: sag_verify({noError, 0, Vbs}, Exp) ->
 2573:     ?DBG("verified first stage ok: "
 2574: 	 "~n   Vbs: ~p"
 2575: 	 "~n   Exp: ~p", [Vbs, Exp]),
 2576:     sag_verify_vbs(Vbs, Exp);
 2577: sag_verify(Error, _) ->
 2578:     {error, {unexpected_response, Error}}.
 2579: 
 2580: sag_verify_vbs([], []) ->
 2581:     ?DBG("verified second stage ok", []),
 2582:     ok;
 2583: sag_verify_vbs(Vbs, []) ->
 2584:     {error, {unexpected_vbs, Vbs}};
 2585: sag_verify_vbs([], Exp) ->
 2586:     {error, {expected_vbs, Exp}};
 2587: sag_verify_vbs([#varbind{oid = Oid}|Vbs], [any|Exp]) ->
 2588:     ?IPRINT("verified [any] oid ~w", [Oid]),
 2589:     sag_verify_vbs(Vbs, Exp);
 2590: sag_verify_vbs([#varbind{oid = Oid, value = Value}|Vbs], [Oid|Exp]) ->
 2591:     ?IPRINT("verified oid ~w [~p]", [Oid, Value]),
 2592:     sag_verify_vbs(Vbs, Exp);
 2593: sag_verify_vbs([#varbind{oid = Oid, value = Value}|Vbs], [{Oid,Value}|Exp]) ->
 2594:     ?IPRINT("verified oid ~w and ~p", [Oid, Value]),
 2595:     sag_verify_vbs(Vbs, Exp);
 2596: sag_verify_vbs([Vb|_], [E|_]) ->
 2597:     {error, {unexpected_vb, Vb, E}}.
 2598: 
 2599:

 2602: simple_async_get3() ->
 2603:     [{doc, "Simple (async) get-request - Version 3 API (TargetName and send-opts)"}].
 2604: 
 2605: simple_async_get3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2606:     ?TC_TRY(simple_async_get3,
 2607:             fun() -> do_simple_async_get3(Config) end).
 2608: 
 2609: do_simple_async_get3(Config) ->
 2610:     ?IPRINT("starting with Config: "
 2611:             "~n      ~p", [Config]),
 2612:     MgrNode    = ?config(manager_node, Config),
 2613:     AgentNode  = ?config(agent_node, Config),
 2614:     TargetName = ?config(manager_agent_target_name, Config),
 2615:     Self  = self(), 
 2616:     Msg   = simple_async_get3, 
 2617:     Fun   = fun() -> Self ! Msg end,
 2618:     Extra = {?SNMPM_EXTRA_INFO_TAG, Fun}, 
 2619:     SendOpts = 
 2620: 	[
 2621: 	 {extra, Extra}
 2622: 	], 
 2623:     Get = fun(Oids) -> async_g_exec3(MgrNode, TargetName, Oids, SendOpts) end,
 2624:     PostVerify = fun(ok)    -> receive Msg -> ok end;
 2625: 		    (Error) -> Error 
 2626: 		 end,
 2627:     Res = do_simple_async_sync_get3(Config, MgrNode, AgentNode,
 2628:                                     Get, PostVerify),
 2629:     display_log(Config),
 2630:     Res.
 2631: 
 2632: do_simple_async_sync_get3(Config, MgrNode, AgentNode, Get, PostVerify) ->
 2633:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, std_mib()),
 2634:     Test2Mib = test2_mib(Config), 
 2635:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, Test2Mib),
 2636:     ok = agent_load_mib(AgentNode, Test2Mib),
 2637:     do_simple_async_sync_get3(fun() -> mgr_info(MgrNode) end,
 2638: 			      fun() -> agent_info(AgentNode) end,
 2639: 			      Get, PostVerify).
 2640: 
 2641: do_simple_async_sync_get3(MgrInfo, AgentInfo, Get, PostVerify) 
 2642:   when is_function(MgrInfo, 0) andalso 
 2643:        is_function(AgentInfo, 0) andalso 
 2644:        is_function(Get, 1) andalso 
 2645:        is_function(PostVerify, 1) ->
 2646:     Requests = 
 2647: 	[
 2648: 	 { 1,  
 2649: 	   [?sysObjectID_instance], 
 2650: 	   Get, 
 2651: 	   fun(X) -> 
 2652: 		   PostVerify(sag_verify(X, [?sysObjectID_instance])) end}, 
 2653: 	 { 2,  
 2654: 	   [?sysDescr_instance, ?sysUpTime_instance],
 2655: 	   Get, 
 2656: 	   fun(X) -> 
 2657: 		   PostVerify(sag_verify(X, [?sysObjectID_instance, 
 2658: 					     ?sysUpTime_instance]))
 2659: 	   end}, 
 2660: 	 { 3,  
 2661: 	   [[sysObjectID, 0], [sysDescr, 0], [sysUpTime, 0]],
 2662: 	   Get, 
 2663: 	   fun(X) -> 
 2664: 		   PostVerify(sag_verify(X, [?sysObjectID_instance, 
 2665: 					     ?sysDescr_instance, 
 2666: 					     ?sysUpTime_instance]))
 2667: 		       
 2668: 	   end}, 
 2669: 	 { 4,  
 2670: 	   [?sysObjectID_instance, 
 2671: 	    ?sysDescr_instance, 
 2672: 	    ?sysUpTime_instance],
 2673: 	   Get, 
 2674: 	   fun(X) -> 
 2675: 		   PostVerify(sag_verify(X, [?sysObjectID_instance, 
 2676: 					     ?sysDescr_instance, 
 2677: 					     ?sysUpTime_instance]))
 2678: 	   end}
 2679: 	],
 2680:     
 2681:     ?IPRINT("manager info when starting test: "
 2682:             "~n      ~p", [MgrInfo()]),
 2683:     ?IPRINT("agent info when starting test: "
 2684:             "~n      ~p",   [AgentInfo()]),
 2685: 
 2686:     ok = async_exec(Requests, []),
 2687: 
 2688:     ?IPRINT("manager info when ending test: "
 2689:             "~n      ~p", [MgrInfo()]),
 2690:     ?IPRINT("agent info when ending test: "
 2691:             "~n      ~p",   [AgentInfo()]),
 2692: 
 2693:     ok.
 2694: 
 2695: async_g_exec3(Node, TargetName, Oids, SendOpts) ->
 2696:     mgr_user_async_get2(Node, TargetName, Oids, SendOpts).
 2697:

 2700: 
 2701: verify_ssgn_reply1({noError, 0, _Vbs}, any) ->
 2702:     ok;
 2703: verify_ssgn_reply1({noError, 0, Vbs}, Expected) ->
 2704:     check_ssgn_vbs(Vbs, Expected);
 2705: verify_ssgn_reply1(R, _) ->
 2706:     {error, {unexpected_reply, R}}.
 2707: 
 2708: verify_ssgn_reply2({ErrStatus, ErrIdx, _Vbs}, {ErrStatus, ErrIdx, any}) ->
 2709:     ok;
 2710: verify_ssgn_reply2({ErrStatus, ErrIdx, Vbs}, {ErrStatus, ErrIdx, Expected}) ->
 2711:     check_ssgn_vbs(Vbs, Expected);
 2712: verify_ssgn_reply2(R, _) ->
 2713:     {error, {unexpected_reply, R}}.
 2714: 
 2715: check_ssgn_vbs([], []) ->
 2716:     ok;
 2717: check_ssgn_vbs(Unexpected, []) ->
 2718:     {error, {unexpected_vbs, Unexpected}};
 2719: check_ssgn_vbs([], Expected) ->
 2720:     {error, {expected_vbs, Expected}};
 2721: check_ssgn_vbs([#varbind{value = endOfMibView}|R], 
 2722: 	       [endOfMibView|Expected]) ->
 2723:     check_ssgn_vbs(R, Expected);
 2724: check_ssgn_vbs([#varbind{oid = Oid}|R], [Oid|Expected]) ->
 2725:     check_ssgn_vbs(R, Expected);
 2726: check_ssgn_vbs([#varbind{oid = Oid, value = Value}|R], 
 2727: 	       [{Oid, Value}|Expected]) ->
 2728:     check_ssgn_vbs(R, Expected);
 2729: check_ssgn_vbs([Vb|_], [E|_]) ->
 2730:     {error, {unexpected_vb, Vb, E}}.
 2731:

 2740:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),

 2743:             "~n      ~p", [Config]),
 2744:     Self  = self(), 
 2745:     Msg   = simple_sync_get_next3, 
 2746:     Fun   = fun() -> Self ! Msg end,
 2747:     Extra = {?SNMPM_EXTRA_INFO_TAG, Fun}, 
 2748:     SendOpts = 
 2749: 	[
 2750: 	 {extra, Extra}
 2751: 	], 
 2752:     GetNext = fun(Node, TargetName, Oids) -> 
 2753: 		      mgr_user_sync_get_next2(Node, TargetName, Oids, SendOpts) 
 2754: 	      end,
 2755:     PostVerify = fun(ok)    -> receive Msg -> ok end;
 2756: 		    (Error) -> Error 
 2757: 		 end,
 2758:     do_simple_sync_get_next3(Config, GetNext, PostVerify),
 2759:     display_log(Config),
 2760:     ok.
 2761: 
 2762: 
 2763: do_simple_sync_get_next3(Config, GetNext, PostVerify) 
 2764:   when is_function(GetNext, 3) andalso is_function(PostVerify, 1) ->
 2765: 
 2766:     MgrNode    = ?config(manager_node, Config),
 2767:     AgentNode  = ?config(agent_node, Config),
 2768:     TargetName = ?config(manager_agent_target_name, Config),
 2769: 
 2770:     %% -- 1 --
 2771:     Oids01 = [[1,3,7,1]],
 2772:     VF01   = fun(X) -> verify_ssgn_reply1(X, [{[1,3,7,1],endOfMibView}]) end,
 2773:     ok = do_simple_get_next(1,
 2774: 				  MgrNode, TargetName, Oids01, VF01, 
 2775: 				  GetNext, PostVerify),
 2776:     
 2777:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, std_mib()),
 2778: 
 2779:     %% -- 2 --
 2780:     Oids02 = [[sysDescr], [1,3,7,1]], 
 2781:     VF02   = fun(X) -> 
 2782: 		     verify_ssgn_reply1(X, [?sysDescr_instance, endOfMibView]) 
 2783: 	     end,
 2784:     ok = do_simple_get_next(2,
 2785: 				  MgrNode, TargetName, Oids02, VF02, 
 2786: 				  GetNext, PostVerify),
 2787:     
 2788:     Test2Mib = test2_mib(Config), 
 2789:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, Test2Mib),
 2790:     ok = agent_load_mib(AgentNode, Test2Mib),
 2791: 
 2792:     %% -- 3 --
 2793:     {ok, [TCnt2|_]} = mgr_user_name_to_oid(MgrNode, tCnt2),
 2794:     Oids03 = [[TCnt2, 1]], 
 2795:     VF03   = fun(X) -> 
 2796: 		     verify_ssgn_reply1(X, [{fl([TCnt2,2]), 100}]) 
 2797: 	     end,
 2798:     ok = do_simple_get_next(3,
 2799: 				  MgrNode, TargetName, Oids03, VF03, 
 2800: 				  GetNext, PostVerify),

 2804:     VF04   = fun(X) -> 
 2805: 		     verify_ssgn_reply1(X, [{fl([TCnt2,2]), endOfMibView}]) 
 2806: 	     end,
 2807:     ok = do_simple_get_next(4,
 2808: 				  MgrNode, TargetName, Oids04, VF04, 
 2809: 				  GetNext, PostVerify),
 2810:

 2813:     Oids05 = [TGenErr1], 
 2814:     VF05   = fun(X) -> 
 2815: 		     verify_ssgn_reply2(X, {genErr, 1, [TGenErr1]}) 
 2816: 	     end,
 2817:     ok = do_simple_get_next(5,
 2818: 				  MgrNode, TargetName, Oids05, VF05, 
 2819: 				  GetNext, PostVerify),
 2820:     
 2821:     %% -- 6 --
 2822:     {ok, [TGenErr2|_]} = mgr_user_name_to_oid(MgrNode, tGenErr2),
 2823:     Oids06 = [TGenErr2], 
 2824:     VF06   = fun(X) -> 
 2825: 		     verify_ssgn_reply2(X, {genErr, 1, [TGenErr2]}) 
 2826: 	     end,
 2827:     ok = do_simple_get_next(6,
 2828: 				  MgrNode, TargetName, Oids06, VF06, 
 2829: 				  GetNext, PostVerify),
 2830:     
 2831:     %% -- 7 --
 2832:     {ok, [TGenErr3|_]} = mgr_user_name_to_oid(MgrNode, tGenErr3),
 2833:     Oids07 = [[sysDescr], TGenErr3], 
 2834:     VF07   = fun(X) -> 
 2835: 		     verify_ssgn_reply2(X, {genErr, 2, 
 2836: 					   [?sysDescr, TGenErr3]}) 
 2837: 	     end,
 2838:     ok = do_simple_get_next(7,
 2839: 				  MgrNode, TargetName, Oids07, VF07, 
 2840: 				  GetNext, PostVerify),
 2841:     
 2842:     %% -- 8 --
 2843:     {ok, [TTooBig|_]} = mgr_user_name_to_oid(MgrNode, tTooBig),
 2844:     Oids08 = [TTooBig], 
 2845:     VF08   = fun(X) -> 
 2846: 		     verify_ssgn_reply2(X, {tooBig, 0, []}) 
 2847: 	     end,
 2848:     ok = do_simple_get_next(8,
 2849: 				  MgrNode, TargetName, Oids08, VF08, 
 2850: 				  GetNext, PostVerify),
 2851:     ok.
 2852: 
 2853: do_simple_get_next(N, Node, TargetName, Oids, Verify, GetNext, PostVerify) ->
 2854:     ?IPRINT("issue get-next command ~w", [N]),
 2855:     case GetNext(Node, TargetName, Oids) of
 2856: 	{ok, Reply, _Rem} ->
 2857: 	    ?DBG("get-next ok:"
 2858: 		 "~n   Reply: ~p"
 2859: 		 "~n   Rem:   ~w", [Reply, _Rem]),
 2860: 	    PostVerify(Verify(Reply));
 2861: 
 2862: 	Error ->
 2863: 	    {error, {unexpected_reply, Error}}
 2864:     end.

 3019: value_of_vavs(VAVs) ->
 3020:     value_of_vavs(VAVs, []).
 3021: 
 3022: value_of_vavs([], Acc) ->
 3023:     lists:reverse(Acc);
 3024: value_of_vavs([{_Oid, _Type, Val}|VAVs], Acc) ->
 3025:     value_of_vavs(VAVs, [Val|Acc]);
 3026: value_of_vavs([{_Oid, Val}|VAVs], Acc) ->
 3027:     value_of_vavs(VAVs, [Val|Acc]).

 3031: 
 3032: simple_sync_set3() ->
 3033:     [{doc, "Simple (sync) set-request - Version 3 API (TargetName with send-opts)"}].
 3034: 
 3035: simple_sync_set3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3036:     ?TC_TRY(simple_sync_set3,
 3037:             fun() -> do_simple_sync_set3(Config) end).
 3038: 
 3039: do_simple_sync_set3(Config) ->
 3040:     ?IPRINT("starting with Config: "
 3041:             "~n      ~p", [Config]),
 3042: 
 3043:     Self  = self(), 
 3044:     Msg   = simple_sync_set3, 
 3045:     Fun   = fun() -> Self ! Msg end,
 3046:     Extra = {?SNMPM_EXTRA_INFO_TAG, Fun}, 
 3047:     SendOpts = 
 3048: 	[
 3049: 	 {extra, Extra}
 3050: 	], 
 3051:     
 3052:     Set = fun(Node, TargetName, VAVs) -> 
 3053: 		  mgr_user_sync_set2(Node, TargetName, VAVs, SendOpts) 
 3054: 	  end,
 3055:     PostVerify = fun() -> receive Msg -> ok end end,
 3056: 
 3057:     Res = do_simple_sync_set3(Config, Set, PostVerify),
 3058:     display_log(Config),
 3059:     Res.
 3060: 
 3061: do_simple_sync_set3(Config, Set, PostVerify) 
 3062:   when is_function(Set, 3) andalso is_function(PostVerify, 0) ->
 3063: 
 3064:     Node       = ?config(manager_node, Config),
 3065:     TargetName = ?config(manager_agent_target_name, Config),
 3066: 
 3067:     ?IPRINT("issue set-request without loading the mib"),
 3068:     Val11 = "Arne Anka",
 3069:     Val12 = "Stockholm",
 3070:     VAVs1 = [
 3071: 	     {?sysName_instance,     s, Val11},
 3072: 	     {?sysLocation_instance, s, Val12}
 3073: 	    ],
 3074:     ok = do_simple_set3(Node, TargetName, VAVs1, Set, PostVerify),
 3075: 
 3076:     ?IPRINT("issue set-request after first loading the mibs"),
 3077:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(Node, std_mib()),
 3078:     Val21 = "Sune Anka",
 3079:     Val22 = "Gothenburg",
 3080:     VAVs2 = [
 3081: 	     {[sysName, 0],     Val21},
 3082: 	     {[sysLocation, 0], Val22}
 3083: 	    ],
 3084:     ok = do_simple_set3(Node, TargetName, VAVs2, Set, PostVerify),
 3085:     ok.
 3086: 
 3087: do_simple_set3(Node, TargetName, VAVs, Set, PostVerify) ->
 3088:     [SysName, SysLoc] = value_of_vavs(VAVs),
 3089:     {ok, Reply, _Rem} = Set(Node, TargetName, VAVs),
 3090: 
 3091:     ?DBG("~n   Reply: ~p"
 3092: 	 "~n   Rem:   ~w", [Reply, _Rem]),
 3093: 
 3094:     %% verify that the operation actually worked:
 3095:     %% The order should be the same, so no need to search
 3096:     %% The value we get should be exactly the same as we sent
 3097:     ok = case Reply of
 3098: 		   {noError, 0, [#varbind{oid   = ?sysName_instance,
 3099: 					  value = SysName},
 3100: 				 #varbind{oid   = ?sysLocation_instance,
 3101: 					  value = SysLoc}]} ->
 3102: 		       PostVerify();
 3103: 		   {noError, 0, Vbs} ->
 3104: 		       {error, {unexpected_vbs, Vbs}};
 3105: 		   Else ->
 3106: 		       ?EPRINT("unexpected reply: "
 3107:                                "~n      ~p", [Else]),
 3108: 		       {error, {unexpected_response, Else}}
 3109: 	       end,
 3110:     ok.
 3111: 
 3112: 
 3113: %%======================================================================
 3114: 
 3115: sas_verify({noError, 0, _Vbs}, any) ->
 3116:     ?IPRINT("verified [any]"),
 3117:     ok;
 3118: sas_verify({noError, 0, Vbs}, Expected) ->
 3119:     ?DBG("verified stage 1: "
 3120: 	 "~n   Vbs: ~p"
 3121: 	 "~n   Exp: ~p", [Vbs, Expected]),
 3122:     sas_verify_vbs(Vbs, Expected);
 3123: sas_verify(Error, _) ->
 3124:     {error, {unexpected_reply, Error}}.
 3125: 
 3126: sas_verify_vbs([], []) ->
 3127:     ok;
 3128: sas_verify_vbs(Vbs, []) ->
 3129:     {error, {unexpected_vbs, Vbs}};
 3130: sas_verify_vbs([], Exp) ->
 3131:     {error, {expected_vbs, Exp}};
 3132: sas_verify_vbs([#varbind{oid = Oid}|Vbs], [any|Exp]) ->
 3133:     ?IPRINT("verified [any] oid ~w", [Oid]),
 3134:     sas_verify_vbs(Vbs, Exp);
 3135: sas_verify_vbs([#varbind{oid = Oid, value = Value}|Vbs], [Oid|Exp]) ->
 3136:     ?IPRINT("verified oid ~w [~p]", [Oid, Value]),
 3137:     sas_verify_vbs(Vbs, Exp);
 3138: sas_verify_vbs([#varbind{oid = Oid, value = Value}|Vbs], [{Oid,Value}|Exp]) ->
 3139:     ?IPRINT("verified oid ~w and ~p", [Oid, Value]),
 3140:     sas_verify_vbs(Vbs, Exp);
 3141: sas_verify_vbs([Vb|_], [E|_]) ->
 3142:     {error, {unexpected_vb, Vb, E}}.
 3143: 
 3144:

 3220: 	  end},

 3224: 	  Set,
 3225: 	  fun(X) ->
 3226: 		  PostVerify(sas_verify(X,

 3230: 	],

 3253: fl(L) ->

 3256: verify_ssgb_reply1({noError, 0, []}) ->
 3257:     ok;
 3258: verify_ssgb_reply1(X) ->
 3259:     {error, {unexpected_reply, X}}.
 3260: 
 3261: verify_ssgb_reply2({noError, 0, Vbs}, ExpectedVbs) ->
 3262:     check_ssgb_vbs(Vbs, ExpectedVbs);
 3263: verify_ssgb_reply2(Error, _) ->
 3264:     {error, {unexpected_reply, Error}}.
 3265: 
 3266: verify_ssgb_reply3({genErr, 3, Vbs}, ExpectedVbs) ->
 3267:     check_ssgb_vbs(Vbs, ExpectedVbs);
 3268: verify_ssgb_reply3(Unexpected, _) ->
 3269:     {error, {unexpected_reply, Unexpected}}.
 3270: 
 3271: check_ssgb_vbs([], []) ->
 3272:     ok;
 3273: check_ssgb_vbs(Unexpected, []) ->
 3274:     {error, {unexpected_vbs, Unexpected}};
 3275: check_ssgb_vbs([], Expected) ->
 3276:     {error, {expected_vbs, Expected}};
 3277: check_ssgb_vbs([#varbind{value = endOfMibView}|R], 
 3278: 	       [endOfMibView|Expected]) ->
 3279:     check_ssgb_vbs(R, Expected);
 3280: check_ssgb_vbs([#varbind{oid = Oid}|R], [Oid|Expected]) ->
 3281:     check_ssgb_vbs(R, Expected);
 3282: check_ssgb_vbs([#varbind{oid = Oid, value = Value}|R], 
 3283: 	       [{Oid, Value}|Expected]) ->
 3284:     check_ssgb_vbs(R, Expected);
 3285: check_ssgb_vbs([R|_], [E|_]) ->
 3286:     {error, {unexpected_vb, R, E}}.
 3287:

 3290: simple_sync_get_bulk3() ->
 3291:     [{doc, "Simple (sync) get_bulk-request - "
 3292:      "Version 3 API (TargetName with send-opts)"}].
 3293: 
 3294: simple_sync_get_bulk3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3295:     ?TC_TRY(simple_sync_get_bulk3,
 3296:             fun() -> do_simple_sync_get_bulk3(Config) end).
 3297: 
 3298: do_simple_sync_get_bulk3(Config) ->
 3299:     ?IPRINT("starting with Config: "
 3300:             "~n      ~p~n", [Config]),
 3301: 
 3302:     MgrNode    = ?config(manager_node, Config),
 3303:     AgentNode  = ?config(agent_node, Config),
 3304:     TargetName = ?config(manager_agent_target_name, Config),
 3305: 
 3306:     Self  = self(), 
 3307:     Msg   = simple_async_set3, 
 3308:     Fun   = fun() -> Self ! Msg end,
 3309:     Extra = {?SNMPM_EXTRA_INFO_TAG, Fun}, 
 3310:     SendOpts = 
 3311: 	[
 3312: 	 {extra, Extra}
 3313: 	], 
 3314: 
 3315:     GetBulk = 
 3316: 	fun(NonRep, MaxRep, Oids) ->
 3317: 		mgr_user_sync_get_bulk2(MgrNode, TargetName, 
 3318: 					NonRep, MaxRep, Oids, SendOpts)    
 3319: 	end,
 3320:     PostVerify = fun(ok) -> receive Msg -> ok end;
 3321: 		    (Res) -> Res 
 3322: 		 end,
 3323: 
 3324:     Res = do_simple_sync_get_bulk3(Config, MgrNode, AgentNode, GetBulk, PostVerify),
 3325:     display_log(Config),
 3326:     Res.
 3327: 
 3328: do_simple_sync_get_bulk3(Config, MgrNode, AgentNode, GetBulk, PostVerify) ->
 3329:     %% -- 1 --
 3330:     ok = do_simple_get_bulk3(1,
 3331: 				   1,  1, [], 
 3332: 				   fun verify_ssgb_reply1/1, 
 3333: 				   GetBulk, PostVerify), 
 3334:     
 3335:     %% -- 2 --
 3336:     ok = do_simple_get_bulk3(2,
 3337: 				   -1,  1, [], 
 3338: 				   fun verify_ssgb_reply1/1, 
 3339: 				   GetBulk, PostVerify), 
 3340: 
 3341:     %% -- 3 --
 3342:     ok = do_simple_get_bulk3(3,
 3343: 				   -1, -1, [], 
 3344: 				   fun verify_ssgb_reply1/1, 
 3345: 				   GetBulk, PostVerify), 
 3346: 
 3347:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, std_mib()),
 3348:     %% -- 4 --
 3349:     VF04 = fun(X) -> 
 3350: 		   verify_ssgb_reply2(X, [?sysDescr_instance, endOfMibView]) 
 3351: 	   end,
 3352:     ok = do_simple_get_bulk3(4,
 3353: 				   2, 0, [[sysDescr],[1,3,7,1]], VF04, 
 3354: 				   GetBulk, PostVerify),
 3355: 
 3356:     %% -- 5 --
 3357:     ok = do_simple_get_bulk3(5,
 3358: 				   1, 2, [[sysDescr],[1,3,7,1]], VF04, 
 3359: 				   GetBulk, PostVerify),
 3360: 
 3361:     %% -- 6 --
 3362:     VF06 = fun(X) -> 
 3363: 		   verify_ssgb_reply2(X, 
 3364: 				      [?sysDescr_instance,    endOfMibView,
 3365: 				       ?sysObjectID_instance, endOfMibView]) 
 3366: 	   end,
 3367:     ok = do_simple_get_bulk3(6,
 3368: 				   0, 2, [[sysDescr],[1,3,7,1]], VF06, 
 3369: 				   GetBulk, PostVerify), 
 3370: 
 3371:     %% -- 7 --
 3372:     VF07 = fun(X) -> 
 3373: 		   verify_ssgb_reply2(X, 
 3374: 				      [?sysDescr_instance,    endOfMibView,
 3375: 				       ?sysDescr_instance,    endOfMibView,
 3376: 				       ?sysObjectID_instance, endOfMibView]) 
 3377: 	   end,
 3378:     ok = do_simple_get_bulk3(7,
 3379: 				   2, 2, 
 3380: 				   [[sysDescr],[1,3,7,1],[sysDescr],[1,3,7,1]],
 3381: 				   VF07, 
 3382: 				   GetBulk, PostVerify), 
 3383: 
 3384:     Test2Mib = test2_mib(Config), 
 3385:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, Test2Mib),
 3386:     ok = agent_load_mib(AgentNode, Test2Mib),
 3387: 
 3388:     %% -- 8 --
 3389:     VF08 = fun(X) -> 
 3390: 		   verify_ssgb_reply2(X, 
 3391: 				      [?sysDescr_instance, 
 3392: 				       ?sysDescr_instance]) 
 3393: 	   end,
 3394:     ok = do_simple_get_bulk3(8,
 3395: 				   1, 2, 
 3396: 				   [[sysDescr],[sysDescr],[tTooBig]],
 3397: 				   VF08, 
 3398: 				   GetBulk, PostVerify), 
 3399: 
 3400:     %% -- 9 --
 3401:     ok = do_simple_get_bulk3(9,
 3402: 				   1, 12, 
 3403: 				   [[tDescr2], [sysDescr]], 
 3404: 				   fun verify_ssgb_reply1/1, 
 3405: 				   GetBulk, PostVerify),
 3406: 
 3407:     %% -- 10 --
 3408:     VF10 = fun(X) -> 
 3409: 		   verify_ssgb_reply3(X, 
 3410: 				      [{?sysDescr,    'NULL'}, 
 3411: 				       {?sysObjectID, 'NULL'},
 3412: 				       {?tGenErr1,    'NULL'},
 3413: 				       {?sysDescr,    'NULL'}]) 
 3414: 	   end,
 3415:     ok = do_simple_get_bulk3(10,
 3416: 				   2, 2, 
 3417: 				   [[sysDescr], 
 3418: 				    [sysObjectID], 
 3419: 				    [tGenErr1], 
 3420: 				    [sysDescr]],
 3421: 				   VF10, 
 3422: 				   GetBulk, PostVerify), 
 3423: 
 3424:     %% -- 11 --
 3425:     {ok, [TCnt2|_]} = mgr_user_name_to_oid(MgrNode, tCnt2),
 3426:     ?IPRINT("TCnt2: ~p", [TCnt2]),
 3427:     VF11 = fun(X) -> 
 3428: 		   verify_ssgb_reply2(X, 
 3429: 				      [{fl([TCnt2,2]), 100}, 
 3430: 				       {fl([TCnt2,2]), endOfMibView}]) 
 3431: 	   end,
 3432:     ok = do_simple_get_bulk3(11,
 3433: 				   0, 2, 
 3434: 				   [[TCnt2, 1]], VF11, 
 3435: 				   GetBulk, PostVerify),
 3436:     
 3437:     ok.
 3438: 
 3439: do_simple_get_bulk3(N, 
 3440: 		    NonRep, MaxRep, Oids, 
 3441: 		    Verify, GetBulk, PostVerify) 
 3442:   when is_function(Verify, 1) andalso 
 3443:        is_function(GetBulk, 3) andalso 
 3444:        is_function(PostVerify) ->
 3445:     ?IPRINT("issue get-bulk command ~w", [N]),
 3446:     case GetBulk(NonRep, MaxRep, Oids) of
 3447: 	{ok, Reply, _Rem} ->
 3448: 	    ?DBG("get-bulk ok:"
 3449: 		 "~n   Reply: ~p"
 3450: 		 "~n   Rem:   ~w", [Reply, _Rem]),
 3451: 	    PostVerify(Verify(Reply));
 3452: 
 3453: 	Error ->
 3454: 	    {error, {unexpected_reply, Error}}
 3455:     end.

 3556: 		  {-1, -1, []}, 
 3557: 		  GetBulk, 
 3558: 		  fun(X) -> PostVerify(verify_ssgb_reply1(X)) end},
 3559: 		{ 4,  
 3560: 		  {2,  0, [[sysDescr],[1,3,7,1]]}, 
 3561: 		  GetBulk, 
 3562: 		  VF04},
 3563: 		{ 5,  
 3564: 		  {1,  2, [[sysDescr],[1,3,7,1]]},

 3566: 		  VF04},
 3567: 		{ 6,  
 3568: 		  {0,  2, [[sysDescr],[1,3,7,1]]}, 
 3569: 		  GetBulk, 
 3570: 		  VF06},
 3571: 		{ 7,  
 3572: 		  {2,  2, [[sysDescr],[1,3,7,1],[sysDescr],[1,3,7,1]]},

 3574: 		  VF07},
 3575: 		{ 8,

 3581: 		  GetBulk, 
 3582: 		  fun(X) -> PostVerify(verify_ssgb_reply1(X)) end},
 3583: 		{10,  
 3584: 		 {2,  2, [[sysDescr],[sysObjectID], [tGenErr1],[sysDescr]]}, 
 3585: 		 GetBulk,

 3589: 		 GetBulk,

 3593: 		 GetBulk,

 3597: 		 GetBulk,

 3693: 
 3694: %% This difference between these test cases are handled in the
 3695: %% init_per_testcase function (basically auth algorithm).
 3696: simple_v3_exchange(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3697:     ?IPRINT("starting with Config: "
 3698:             "~n      ~p", [Config]),
 3699: 
 3700:     Node       = ?config(manager_node, Config),
 3701:     TargetName = ?config(manager_agent_target_name, Config),
 3702: 
 3703:     Oids1 = [?sysDescr_instance],
 3704:     ?IPRINT("initial try get (expect failure and a report)"),
 3705:     {error, timeout} = mgr_user_sync_get2(Node, TargetName, Oids1, []),
 3706:     receive
 3707:         {async_event, TargetName, {report, {noError, 0, [#varbind{oid = ?usmStatsNotInTimeWindows_instance}]}} = Report1} ->
 3708:             ?IPRINT("received expected report: "
 3709:                     "~n      ~p", [Report1]),
 3710:             ok
 3711:     end,
 3712:     ?IPRINT("second try get (expect success)"),
 3713:     {ok, Reply2, _} = mgr_user_sync_get2(Node, TargetName, Oids1, []),
 3714:     case Reply2 of
 3715:         {noError, 0, [#varbind{oid = ?sysDescr_instance}]} ->
 3716:             ?IPRINT("expected get success"),
 3717:             display_log(Config),
 3718:             ok;
 3719:         X ->
 3720:             {error, X}
 3721:     end.
 3722:

 3725: %%======================================================================
 3726: 
 3727: discovery(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3728:     ?SKIP(not_yet_implemented).
 3729: 
 3730: 
 3731: %%======================================================================
 3732: %% 
 3733: %% Utility functions for cases trap1 and trap2
 3734: %% 
 3735: 
 3736: collect_traps(N) ->
 3737:     collect_traps(N, []).
 3738: 
 3739: collect_traps(0, TrapInfo) ->
 3740:     TrapInfo;
 3741: collect_traps(N, Acc) ->
 3742:     receive
 3743: 	{async_event, _From, {trap, TrapInfo}} ->
 3744: 	    ?IPRINT("collect_traps -> received trap: "
 3745:                     "~n      ~p", [TrapInfo]),
 3746: 	    collect_traps(N-1, [TrapInfo|Acc])
 3747:     after 10000 ->
 3748: 	    ?WPRINT("collect_traps -> still awaiting ~w trap(s) - giving up", [N]),
 3749: 	    Acc
 3750:     end.
 3751: 
 3752: verify_traps([], []) ->
 3753:     ?IPRINT("verify_traps -> done"),
 3754:     ok;
 3755: verify_traps([], Verifiers) ->
 3756:     ?IPRINT("verify_traps -> done when ~w verifiers remain", [length(Verifiers)]),
 3757:     {error, {failed_verify, [Id || {Id, _} <- Verifiers]}};
 3758: verify_traps([Trap|Traps], Verifiers0) ->
 3759:     ?IPRINT("verify_traps -> entry"),
 3760:     case verify_trap(Trap, Verifiers0) of
 3761: 	{ok, Id} ->
 3762: 	    ?IPRINT("verify_traps -> trap verified: ~p", [Id]),
 3763: 	    Verifiers = lists:keydelete(Id, 1, Verifiers0),
 3764: 	    verify_traps(Traps, Verifiers);
 3765: 	error ->
 3766: 	    ?EPRINT("verify_traps -> failed verifying trap: "
 3767:                     "~n      ~p", [Trap]),
 3768: 	    {error, {failed_verifying_trap, Trap}}
 3769:     end.
 3770: 
 3771: verify_trap(Trap, []) ->
 3772:     ?EPRINT("verify_trap -> could not verify trap:"
 3773:             "~n   Trap: ~p", [Trap]),
 3774:     error;
 3775: verify_trap(Trap, [{Id, Verifier}|Verifiers]) ->
 3776:     ?IPRINT("verify_trap -> entry with"
 3777:             "~n   Id:   ~p"
 3778:             "~n   Trap: ~p", [Id, Trap]),
 3779:     case Verifier(Trap) of
 3780: 	ok ->
 3781: 	    ?IPRINT("verify_trap -> verified"),
 3782: 	    {ok, Id};
 3783: 	{error, _} ->
 3784: 	    ?NPRINT("verify_trap -> not verified"),
 3785: 	    verify_trap(Trap, Verifiers)
 3786:     end.
 3787: 
 3788: 
 3789: %%======================================================================
 3790: 
 3791: trap1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3792:     ?TC_TRY(trap1,
 3793:             fun() -> do_trap1(Config) end).
 3794: 
 3795: do_trap1(Config) ->
 3796:     ?IPRINT("starting with Config: "
 3797:             "~n      ~p"
 3798:             "~n", [Config]),
 3799: 
 3800:     MgrNode   = ?config(manager_node, Config),
 3801:     AgentNode = ?config(agent_node, Config),
 3802: 
 3803:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, snmpv2_mib()),
 3804:     Test2Mib      = test2_mib(Config), 
 3805:     TestTrapMib   = test_trap_mib(Config), 
 3806:     TestTrapv2Mib = test_trap_v2_mib(Config), 
 3807:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, Test2Mib),

 3816: 	fun(Ent, Gen, Spec, ExpVBs, Trap) ->
 3817: 		case Trap of
 3818: 		    {Ent, Gen, Spec, _Timestamp, VBs} ->
 3819: 			?IPRINT("trap info as expected"), 
 3820: 			case (catch validate_vbs(MgrNode, 
 3821: 						 ExpVBs, VBs)) of
 3822: 			    ok ->
 3823: 				?IPRINT("valid trap"),

 3831: 		       ?EPRINT("unepxected v1 trap info:"

 4349: 				case (catch validate_testTrapv22_vbs(MgrNode, 
 4350: 								     VBs)) of
 4351: 				    ok ->
 4352: 					?IPRINT("valid inform"),
 4353: 					Pid ! {handle_inform_no_response, 
 4354: 					       From}, 
 4355: 					ok;
 4356: 				    Error ->
 4357: 					?IPRINT("invalid inform: "
 4358:                                                 "~n      ~p", [Error]),
 4359: 					Error
 4360: 				end;
 4361: 			    {Err, Idx, VBs} ->
 4362: 				?EPRINT("unexpected error status: "
 4363:                                         "~n   Err: ~p"
 4364:                                         "~n   Idx: ~p"
 4365:                                         "~n   VBs: ~p", [Err, Idx, VBs]),
 4366: 				Reason = {unexpected_status, {Err, Idx, VBs}},
 4367: 				{error, Reason}
 4368: 			end
 4369: 		after 10000 ->
 4370: 			receive 
 4371: 			    Any ->
 4372: 				{error, {timeout_crap, Any}}
 4373: 			after 1000 ->
 4374: 				{error, timeout}
 4375: 			end
 4376: 		end
 4377: 	end,

 4718: %%======================================================================
 4719: %% 
 4720: %% Test: ts:run(snmp, snmp_manager_test, inform_swarm_cbp_def, [batch]).
 4721: 
 4722: inform_swarm_cbp_def(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4723:     inform_swarm(is_cbp_def, 1500, Config).
 4724: 
 4725: inform_swarm_cbp_temp(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4726:     inform_swarm(is_cbp_temp, 1500, Config).
 4727: 
 4728: inform_swarm_cbp_perm(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4729:     inform_swarm(is_cbp_perm, 1800, Config).
 4730: 
 4731: inform_swarm(Case, NumI, Config) ->
 4732:     ?TC_TRY(Case,
 4733:             fun() -> do_inform_swarm(NumI, Config) end).
 4734: 
 4735: do_inform_swarm(NumI, Config) ->
 4736:     %% process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 4737:     ?IPRINT("starting with"
 4738:             "~n      NumI:   ~p"
 4739:             "~n      Config: ~p"
 4740:             "~n", [NumI, Config]),
 4741: 
 4742:     MgrNode   = ?config(manager_node, Config),
 4743:     AgentNode = ?config(agent_node,   Config),
 4744:     Factor    = ?config(snmp_factor,  Config),
 4745: 
 4746:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, snmpv2_mib()),
 4747:     Test2Mib      = test2_mib(Config), 
 4748:     TestTrapMib   = test_trap_mib(Config), 
 4749:     TestTrapv2Mib = test_trap_v2_mib(Config), 
 4750:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, Test2Mib),
 4751:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, TestTrapMib),
 4752:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, TestTrapv2Mib),
 4753:     ok = agent_load_mib(AgentNode,  Test2Mib),
 4754:     ok = agent_load_mib(AgentNode,  TestTrapMib),
 4755:     ok = agent_load_mib(AgentNode,  TestTrapv2Mib),
 4756:     NumInforms = NumI div Factor,
 4757: 
 4758:     Collector = self(),
 4759: 
 4760:     Generator = 
 4761: 	erlang:spawn(
 4762: 	  fun() ->
 4763: 		  receive
 4764: 		      {Collector, start} ->
 4765: 			  ok
 4766: 		  end,
 4767: 		  Seqs = lists:seq(1, NumInforms),
 4768: 		  lists:foreach(
 4769: 		    fun(N) ->
 4770: 			    ?IPRINT("send notification ~w", [N]),
 4771: 			    agent_send_notif(AgentNode, 
 4772: 					     testTrapv22, 
 4773: 					     {{inform2_tag1, N}, Collector},
 4774: 					     "standard inform",
 4775: 					     []),
 4776: 			    %% Sleep 1000 ms every 100th notif
 4777: 			    %% Sleep 100  ms every 10th notif
 4778: 			    if
 4779:                                 N rem 100 == 0 ->
 4780:                                     Sleep = 1000,
 4781: 				    ?IPRINT("sleep ~w [~w]", [Sleep, N]),
 4782:                                     ?SLEEP(Sleep);
 4783: 				N rem 10 == 0 ->
 4784:                                     Sleep = 100,
 4785: 				    ?IPRINT("sleep ~w [~w]", [Sleep, N]),
 4786: 				    ?SLEEP(Sleep);
 4787: 				true ->
 4788: 				    ok
 4789: 			    end
 4790: 		    end,
 4791: 		    Seqs),
 4792: 		  ok
 4793: 	  end), 
 4794: 
 4795:     Cmd1 = 
 4796: 	fun() ->
 4797: 		?IPRINT("manager info: "
 4798:                         "~n      ~p", [mgr_info(MgrNode)]),
 4799: 		?IPRINT("agent info: "
 4800:                         "~n      ~p", [agent_info(AgentNode)]),
 4801: 		ok
 4802: 	end,
 4803: 
 4804:     Cmd2 = fun() -> Generator ! {Collector, start}, ok end,
 4805: 
 4806:     Cmd3 = 
 4807: 	fun() ->
 4808: 		inform_swarm_collector(NumInforms)
 4809: 	end,
 4810: 
 4811: 
 4812:     Cmd4 = fun() -> ?SLEEP(1000), ok end,
 4813: 
 4814:     Commands = 
 4815: 	[
 4816: 	 {1, "Manager and agent info at start of test",             Cmd1},
 4817: 	 {2, ?F("Send ~p notification(s) from agent", [NumInforms]), Cmd2},
 4818: 	 {3, "Await send-ack(s)/inform(s)/response(s)",             Cmd3},
 4819: 	 {4, "Sleep some time (1 sec)",                             Cmd4},
 4820: 	 {5, "Manager and agent info after test completion",        Cmd1}
 4821: 	],
 4822: 
 4823:     Res = command_handler(Commands),
 4824:     display_log(Config),
 4825:     Res.
 4826: 
 4827: 
 4828: inform_swarm_collector(N) ->
 4829:     inform_swarm_collector(N, 0, 0, 0, ?SECS(60)).
 4830: 
 4831: %% Note that we need to deal with re-transmissions!
 4832: %% That is, the agent did not receive the ack in time,
 4833: %% and therefore did a re-transmit. This means that we
 4834: %% expect to receive more inform's then we actually
 4835: %% sent. So for success we assume:
 4836: %%
 4837: %%     SentAckCnt =  N
 4838: %%     RespCnt    =  N
 4839: %%     RecvCnt    >= N
 4840: %% 
 4841: inform_swarm_collector(N, SentAckCnt, RecvCnt, RespCnt, _) 
 4842:   when ((N == SentAckCnt) and 
 4843: 	(N == RespCnt)    and
 4844: 	(N =< RecvCnt)) ->
 4845:     ?IPRINT("inform_swarm_collector -> done when"
 4846:             "~n      N:          ~w"
 4847:             "~n      SentAckCnt: ~w"
 4848:             "~n      RecvCnt:    ~w"
 4849:             "~n      RespCnt:    ~w", [N, SentAckCnt, RecvCnt, RespCnt]),
 4850:     ok;
 4851: inform_swarm_collector(N, SentAckCnt, RecvCnt, RespCnt, Timeout) ->
 4852:     %% ?IPRINT("inform_swarm_collector -> entry with"
 4853:     %%         "~n      N:          ~w"
 4854:     %%         "~n      SentAckCnt: ~w"
 4855:     %%         "~n      RecvCnt:    ~w"
 4856:     %%         "~n      RespCnt:    ~w", [N, SentAckCnt, RecvCnt, RespCnt]),
 4857:     receive
 4858: 	{snmp_targets, {inform2_tag1, Id}, [_Addr]} ->
 4859: 	    ?IPRINT("received inform-sent acknowledgement for ~w", [Id]),
 4860: 	    inform_swarm_collector(N, SentAckCnt+1, RecvCnt, RespCnt, 
 4861: 				   Timeout);
 4862: 
 4863: 	%% The manager has received the actual inform
 4864: 	{async_event, From, {inform, Pid, Inform}} ->
 4865: 	    ?IPRINT("received inform (~p of ~p)", [RecvCnt+1, N]),
 4866: 	    case Inform of
 4867: 		{noError, 0, VBs} when is_list(VBs) ->
 4868: 		    Pid ! {handle_inform_response, From}, 
 4869: 		    inform_swarm_collector(N, SentAckCnt, RecvCnt+1, RespCnt, 
 4870: 					   Timeout);
 4871: 		{Err, Idx, VBs} ->
 4872: 		    ?EPRINT("Unexpected error status: "
 4873:                             "~n   Err: ~p"
 4874:                             "~n   Idx: ~p"
 4875:                             "~n   VBs: ~p", [Err, Idx, VBs]),
 4876: 		    Reason = {unexpected_status, {Err, Idx, VBs}},
 4877: 		    {error, Reason}
 4878: 	    end;
 4879: 
 4880: 	%% The agent has received ack from the manager 
 4881: 	{snmp_notification, {inform2_tag1, Id}, {got_response, Addr}} ->
 4882: 	    ?IPRINT("received expected \"got response\" for ~w "
 4883:                     "notification from: "
 4884:                     "~n      ~p", [Id, Addr]),
 4885: 	    inform_swarm_collector(N, SentAckCnt, RecvCnt, RespCnt+1, 
 4886: 				   Timeout);
 4887: 
 4888: 	%% The agent did not received ack from the manager in time 
 4889: 	{snmp_notification, inform2_tag1, {no_response, Addr}} ->
 4890: 	    ?EPRINT("Received expected \"no response\" notification "
 4891:                     "from: "
 4892:                     "~n      ~p", [Addr]),
 4893: 	    Reason = {no_response, Addr, {N, SentAckCnt, RecvCnt, RespCnt}},
 4894: 	    {error, Reason}
 4895: 
 4896:     after Timeout ->
 4897: 	    %% Give up when we have been dead in the water for Timeout ms
 4898:             ?EPRINT("timeout when"
 4899:                     "~n   N:          ~p"
 4900:                     "~n   SentAckCnt: ~p"
 4901:                     "~n   RecvCnt:    ~p"
 4902:                     "~n   RespCnt:    ~p",
 4903:                     [N, SentAckCnt, RecvCnt, RespCnt]),
 4904: 	    {error, {timeout, N, SentAckCnt, RecvCnt, RespCnt}}
 4905:     end.
 4906: 		    
 4907: 
 4908: %%======================================================================
 4909: 
 4910: report(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4911:     ?SKIP(not_yet_implemented).
 4912: 
 4913:

 4917: otp8015_1() ->
 4918:     [{doc, "OTP-8015:1 - testing the new api-function."}].
 4919: 
 4920: otp8015_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4921:     Pre = fun() ->
 4922:                   SCO     = ?config(socket_create_opts, Config),
 4923:                   ConfDir = ?config(manager_conf_dir,   Config),
 4924:                   DbDir   = ?config(manager_db_dir,     Config),
 4925: 
 4926:                   write_manager_conf(ConfDir),
 4927: 
 4928:                   Opts = [{server,     [{verbosity, trace}]},
 4929:                           {net_if,     [{verbosity, trace}, {options, SCO}]},
 4930:                           {note_store, [{verbosity, trace}]},
 4931:                           {config,     [{verbosity, trace},
 4932:                                         {dir,       ConfDir},
 4933:                                         {db_dir,    DbDir}]}],
 4934: 
 4935:                   ?IPRINT("starting manager"),
 4936:                   ok = snmpm:start_link(Opts),
 4937: 
 4938:                   ?SLEEP(1000),
 4939:                   ok
 4940:           end,
 4941:     Case = fun(_) -> do_otp8015_1(Config) end,
 4942:     Post = fun(_) ->
 4943:                    ?IPRINT("stop manager"),
 4944:                    ok = snmpm:stop(),
 4945:                    ?SLEEP(1000),
 4946:                    ok
 4947:            end,
 4948:     ?TC_TRY(otp8015_1, Pre, Case, Post).
 4949: 
 4950: do_otp8015_1(Config) ->
 4951:     ?IPRINT("starting with Config: "
 4952:            "~n      ~p"
 4953:            "~n", [Config]),
 4954: 
 4955:     snmpm:load_mib(std_mib()), 
 4956:     snmpm:load_mib(test_trap_mib(Config)),
 4957: 
 4958:     ?IPRINT("manager started, now sleep some"),
 4959: 
 4960:     ?SLEEP(1000),
 4961: 
 4962:     ?IPRINT("loaded mibs: ~p", [snmpm:which_mibs()]),
 4963: 
 4964:     ?IPRINT("get some type(s) from the mibs"),    
 4965:     {ok, 'Counter32'} = snmpm:oid_to_type(?snmpOutTraps), 
 4966:     {ok, [IfIndex]}   = snmpm:name_to_oid(ifIndex),
 4967:     {ok, 'INTEGER'}   = snmpm:oid_to_type(IfIndex),
 4968:     
 4969:     ?IPRINT("end"),
 4970:     ok.

 4986: %%======================================================================
 4987: %% async snmp utility functions
 4988: %%======================================================================
 4989: 
 4990: async_exec([], Acc) ->
 4991:     ?IPRINT("all async request's sent => now await responses"),
 4992:     async_verify(async_collector(Acc, []));
 4993: async_exec([{Id, Data, Exec, Ver}|Reqs], Acc) ->
 4994:     ?IPRINT("issue async request ~w", [Id]),
 4995:     {ok, ReqId} = Exec(Data),
 4996:     async_exec(Reqs, [{ReqId, Id, Ver}|Acc]).
 4997: 
 4998: async_collector([], Acc) ->
 4999:     ?IPRINT("received replies for all requests - now sort"),
 5000:     lists:keysort(1, Acc);
 5001: async_collector(Expected, Acc) ->
 5002:     receive
 5003: 	{async_event, ReqId, Reply} ->
 5004: 	    ?IPRINT("received async event with request-id ~w", [ReqId]),
 5005: 	    case lists:keysearch(ReqId, 1, Expected) of
 5006: 		{value, {_, Id, Ver}} ->
 5007: 		    ?IPRINT("event was for request ~w", [Id]),
 5008: 		    Expected2 = lists:keydelete(ReqId, 1, Expected),
 5009: 		    async_collector(Expected2, [{Id, Ver, Reply}|Acc]);
 5010: 		false ->
 5011: 		    % Duplicate reply?
 5012:                     ?EPRINT("unexpected async event: "
 5013:                             "~n      ReqId: ~p"
 5014:                             "~n      Reply: ~p", [ReqId, Reply]),
 5015: 		    ?FAIL({unexpected_async_event, ReqId, Reply})
 5016: 	    end
 5017:     after 10000 ->
 5018: 	    ?FAIL({timeout, {Expected, Acc}})
 5019:     end.
 5020: 
 5021: async_verify([]) ->
 5022:     ok;
 5023: async_verify([{Id, Verify, Reply}|Replies]) ->
 5024:     ?IPRINT("verify reply ~w", [Id]),
 5025:     Verify(Reply),
 5026:     async_verify(Replies).
 5027:

 5029: 
 5030: %%======================================================================
 5031: %% Internal functions
 5032: %%======================================================================
 5033: 
 5034: 
 5035: %% -- Verify varbinds --
 5036: 
 5037: validate_vbs(Node, ExpVBs, VBs) ->
 5038:     validate_vbs(purify_oids(Node, ExpVBs), VBs).
 5039: 
 5040: validate_testTrapv22_vbs(Node, VBs) ->
 5041:     ExpVBs = [{[sysUpTime, 0], any},
 5042: 	      {[snmpTrapOID, 0], ?system ++ [0,1]}],
 5043:     validate_vbs(purify_oids(Node, ExpVBs), VBs).
 5044: 
 5045: validate_vbs([], []) ->
 5046:     ok;
 5047: validate_vbs(Exp, []) ->
 5048:     {error, {expected_vbs, Exp}};
 5049: validate_vbs([], VBs) ->
 5050:     {error, {unexpected_vbs, VBs}};
 5051: validate_vbs([any|Exp], [_|VBs]) ->
 5052:     validate_vbs(Exp, VBs);
 5053: validate_vbs([{_, any}|Exp], [#varbind{}|VBs]) ->
 5054:     validate_vbs(Exp, VBs);
 5055: validate_vbs([{Oid, Val}|Exp], [#varbind{oid = Oid, value = Val}|VBs]) ->
 5056:     validate_vbs(Exp, VBs);
 5057: validate_vbs([{Oid, Val1}|_], [#varbind{oid = Oid, value = Val2}|_]) ->
 5058:     {error, {unexpected_vb_value, Oid, Val1, Val2}};
 5059: validate_vbs([{Oid1, _}|_], [#varbind{oid = Oid2}|_]) ->
 5060:     {error, {unexpected_vb_oid, Oid1, Oid2}}.
 5061: 
 5062: purify_oids(_, []) ->
 5063:     [];
 5064: purify_oids(Node, [{Oid, Val}|Oids]) ->
 5065:     [{purify_oid(Node, Oid), Val}| purify_oids(Node, Oids)].
 5066: 
 5067: purify_oid(Node, Oid) ->
 5068:     case mgr_user_purify_oid(Node, Oid) of
 5069: 	Oid2 when is_list(Oid2) ->
 5070: 	    Oid2;
 5071: 	{error, _} = Error ->
 5072: 	    throw(Error)
 5073:     end.
 5074: 
 5075: 
 5076: %% -- Test case command handler (executor) ---
 5077: 
 5078: command_handler([]) ->
 5079:     ok;
 5080: command_handler([{No, Desc, Cmd}|Cmds]) ->
 5081:     ?IPRINT("command_handler -> command ~w: "
 5082:             "~n   ~s", [No, Desc]),
 5083:     case (catch Cmd()) of
 5084: 	ok ->
 5085:             ?IPRINT("command_handler -> ~w: ok", [No]),
 5086:             command_handler(Cmds);
 5087:         {error, Reason} ->
 5088:             ?EPRINT("Command_handler -> ~w error: "
 5089:                     "~n      ~p", [No, Reason]),
 5090:             ?FAIL({command_failed, No, Reason});
 5091:         Error ->
 5092:             ?EPRINT("Command_handler -> ~w unexpected: "
 5093:                     "~n      ~p", [No, Error]),
 5094:             ?FAIL({unexpected_command_result, No, Error})
 5095:     end.

 5098: %% -- Misc manager functions --
 5099: 
 5100: init_manager(Case, AutoInform, Config) ->
 5101: 
 5102:     ?IPRINT("init_manager -> entry with"
 5103:             "~n   AutoInform: ~p"
 5104:             "~n   Config:     ~p", [AutoInform, Config]),
 5105: 
 5106:     %% -- 
 5107:     %% Start node
 5108:     %% 
 5109: 
 5110:     {Peer, Node} = start_node(lists:concat([Case, "-mgr"])),
 5111: 
 5112:     %% The point with this (try catch block) is to be 
 5113:     %% able to do some cleanup in case we fail to 
 5114:     %% start some of the apps. That is, if we fail to 
 5115:     %% start the apps (mnesia, crypto and snmp agent) 
 5116:     %% we stop the (agent) node!
 5117: 
 5118:     try
 5119: 	begin
 5120: 
 5121: 	    %% -- 
 5122: 	    %% Start and initiate crypto on manager node
 5123: 	    %% 
 5124: 
 5125: 	    ok = init_crypto(Node),
 5126: 
 5127: 	    %% 
 5128: 	    %% Write manager config
 5129: 	    %% 
 5130: 
 5131: 	    ok = write_manager_config(Config),
 5132: 
 5133: 	    IRB  = case AutoInform of
 5134: 		       true ->
 5135: 			   auto;
 5136: 		       _ ->
 5137: 			   user
 5138: 		   end,
 5139: 	    Conf = [{manager_node, Node},
 5140:                     {manager_peer, Peer},
 5141:                     {irb, IRB} | Config],
 5142: 	    Vsns = [v1,v2,v3], 
 5143: 	    start_manager(Node, Vsns, Conf)
 5144: 	end
 5145:     catch
 5146: 	C:{suite_failed, Reason, _M, _L} = E:S when (C =:= exit) ->
 5147: 	    ?EPRINT("Failure during manager start (suite-failed):"
 5148:                     "~n      Reason:      ~p"
 5149:                     "~n      StackTrace:  ~p", [Reason, S]), 
 5150: 	    %% And now, *try* to cleanup
 5151: 	    (catch peer:stop(Peer)),
 5152: 	    erlang:raise(C, E, S);
 5153: 	C:E:S ->
 5154: 	    ?EPRINT("Failure during manager start: "
 5155:                     "~n      Error Class: ~p"
 5156:                     "~n      Error:       ~p"
 5157:                     "~n      StackTrace:  ~p", [C, E, S]), 
 5158: 	    %% And now, *try* to cleanup
 5159: 	    (catch peer:stop(Peer)),
 5160: 	    ?FAIL({failed_starting_manager, C, E, S})
 5161:     end.
 5162: 
 5163: init_v3_manager(Case, Config) ->
 5164: 
 5165:     ?IPRINT("init_v3_manager -> entry with"
 5166:             "~n   Config: ~p", [Config]),
 5167: 
 5168:     %% -- 
 5169:     %% Start node
 5170:     %% 
 5171: 
 5172:     {Peer, Node} = start_node(lists:concat([Case, "-v3mgr"])),
 5173: 
 5174:     %% The point with this (try catch block) is to be 
 5175:     %% able to do some cleanup in case we fail to 
 5176:     %% start some of the apps. That is, if we fail to 
 5177:     %% start the apps (mnesia, crypto and snmp agent) 
 5178:     %% we stop the (agent) node!
 5179: 
 5180:     try
 5181: 	begin
 5182: 
 5183: 	    %% -- 
 5184: 	    %% Start and initiate crypto on manager node
 5185: 	    %% 
 5186: 
 5187: 	    ok = init_crypto(Node),
 5188: 
 5189: 	    %% 
 5190: 	    %% Write manager config
 5191: 	    %% 
 5192: 
 5193:             %% DomainType is just a "dummy" arg to make the 
 5194:             %% function choose transportDomainUdpIpv4 as transport domain.
 5195: 	    ok = write_manager_config(transport, Config),
 5196: 
 5197: 	    IRB  = auto,
 5198: 	    Conf = [{manager_node, Node},
 5199:                     {manager_peer, Peer},
 5200:                     {irb, IRB} | Config],
 5201: 	    Vsns = [v3], 
 5202: 	    start_manager(Node, Vsns, Conf)
 5203: 	end
 5204:     catch
 5205: 	C:{suite_failed, Reason, _M, _L} = E:S when (C =:= exit) ->
 5206: 	    ?EPRINT("Failure during manager start (suite-failed):"
 5207:                     "~n      Reason:      ~p"
 5208:                     "~n      StackTrace:  ~p", [Reason, S]), 
 5209: 	    %% And now, *try* to cleanup
 5210: 	    (catch peer:stop(Peer)),
 5211: 	    erlang:raise(C, E, S);
 5212: 	C:E:S ->
 5213: 	    ?EPRINT("Failure during manager start: "
 5214:                     "~n      Error Class: ~p"
 5215:                     "~n      Error:       ~p"
 5216:                     "~n      StackTrace:  ~p", [C, E, S]), 
 5217: 	    %% And now, *try* to cleanup
 5218: 	    (catch peer:stop(Peer)),
 5219: 	    ?FAIL({failed_starting_manager, C, E, S})
 5220:     end.
 5221: 
 5222: fin_v3_manager(Config) ->
 5223:     fin_manager(Config).
 5224: 
 5225: fin_manager(Config) ->
 5226:     Node = ?config(manager_node, Config),
 5227:     StopMgrRes    = stop_manager(Node),
 5228:     StopCryptoRes = fin_crypto(Node),
 5229:     StopNode      = peer:stop(?config(manager_peer, Config)),
 5230:     ?IPRINT("fin_manager -> stop apps and (mgr node ~p) node results: "
 5231:             "~n      SNMP Mgr: ~p"
 5232:             "~n      Crypto:   ~p"
 5233:             "~n      Node:     ~p", 
 5234:             [Node, StopMgrRes, StopCryptoRes, StopNode]),
 5235:     Config.

 5243: 
 5244:     %% -- 
 5245:     %% Retrieve some dir's
 5246:     %% 
 5247:     Dir    = ?config(agent_dir, Config),
 5248:     MibDir = ?config(mib_dir,  Config),
 5249: 
 5250:     %% -- 
 5251:     %% Start node
 5252:     %% 
 5253: 
 5254:     {Peer, Node} = start_node(lists:concat([Case, "-agent"])),
 5255: 
 5256:     %% The point with this (try catch block) is to be 
 5257:     %% able to do some cleanup in case we fail to 
 5258:     %% start some of the apps. That is, if we fail to 
 5259:     %% start the apps (mnesia, crypto and snmp agent) 
 5260:     %% we stop the (agent) node!
 5261: 
 5262:     try
 5263: 	begin
 5264: 
 5265: 	    %% -- 
 5266: 	    %% Start and initiate mnesia on agent node

 5268:

 5272: 	    %% --

 5280: 	    %% Write agent config
 5281: 	    %%

 5283: 	    Vsns = [v1,v2], 
 5284: 	    ok = write_agent_config(Vsns, Config),
 5285: 
 5286: 	    Conf = [{agent_node, Node},  {agent_peer, Peer},
 5287: 		    {mib_dir,    MibDir} | Config],

 5289: 	    %% 
 5290: 	    %% Start the agent 
 5291: 	    %% 
 5292: 
 5293: 	    start_agent(Node, Vsns, Conf)
 5294: 	end
 5295:     catch
 5296: 	C:{suite_failed, Reason, _M, _L} = E:S when (C =:= exit) ->
 5297: 	    ?EPRINT("Failure during agent start (suite-failed):"
 5298:                     "~n   Reason:     ~p"
 5299:                     "~n   StackTrace: ~p", [Reason, S]), 
 5300: 	    %% And now, *try* to cleanup
 5301: 	    (catch peer:stop(Peer)),
 5302: 	    erlang:raise(C, E, S);
 5303: 	C:E:S ->
 5304: 	    ?EPRINT("Failure during agent start: "
 5305:                     "~n   Error Class: ~p"
 5306:                     "~n   Error:       ~p"
 5307:                     "~n   StackTrace:  ~p", [C, E, S]), 
 5308: 	    %% And now, *try* to cleanup
 5309: 	    (catch peer:stop(Peer)),
 5310: 	    ?FAIL({failed_starting_agent, C, E, S})
 5311:     end.

 5391:             "~n   Mnesia:     ~p"

 5398:     StopAgentRes  = stop_agent(Node),
 5399:     StopCryptoRes = fin_crypto(Node),
 5400:     StopNode      = peer:stop(?config(agent_peer, Config)),
 5401:     ?IPRINT("fin_agent -> stop apps and (agent node ~p) node results: "
 5402:             "~n   SNMP Agent: ~p"
 5403:             "~n   Crypto:     ~p"
 5404:             "~n   Node:       ~p",

 5407: 
 5408: init_mnesia(Node, Dir, MnesiaDebug) 
 5409:   when ((MnesiaDebug =/= none) andalso 
 5410: 	(MnesiaDebug =/= debug) andalso (MnesiaDebug =/= trace)) ->
 5411:     init_mnesia(Node, Dir, ?DEFAULT_MNESIA_DEBUG);
 5412: init_mnesia(Node, Dir, MnesiaDebug) ->
 5413:     ?DBG("init_mnesia -> load application mnesia", []),
 5414:     ok = load_mnesia(Node),
 5415: 
 5416:     ?DBG("init_mnesia -> application mnesia: set_env dir: ~n~p",[Dir]),
 5417:     ok = set_mnesia_env(Node, dir, filename:join(Dir, "mnesia")),
 5418: 
 5419:     %% Just in case, only set (known to be) valid values for debug
 5420:     if
 5421: 	((MnesiaDebug =:= debug) orelse (MnesiaDebug =:= trace)) ->
 5422: 	    ?DBG("init_mnesia -> application mnesia: set_env debug: ~w", 
 5423: 		 [MnesiaDebug]),
 5424: 	    ok = set_mnesia_env(Node, debug, MnesiaDebug);
 5425: 	true ->
 5426: 	    ok
 5427:     end,
 5428: 
 5429:     ?DBG("init_mnesia -> create mnesia schema",[]),
 5430:     case create_schema(Node) of
 5431: 	      ok ->
 5432: 		  ok;
 5433: 	      {error, {Node, {already_exists, Node}}} ->
 5434: 		  ok = delete_schema(Node),
 5435: 		  ok = create_schema(Node);
 5436: 	      Error ->
 5437: 		  ?FAIL({failed_creating_mnesia_schema, Error})
 5438: 	  end,
 5439:     
 5440:     ?DBG("init_mnesia -> start application mnesia",[]),
 5441:     ok = start_mnesia(Node),
 5442: 
 5443:     ?DBG("init_mnesia -> create tables",[]),
 5444:     ok = create_tables(Node),
 5445:     ok.
 5446: 
 5447: fin_mnesia(Node) ->
 5448:     ok = delete_tables(Node),
 5449:     ok = stop_mnesia(Node),
 5450:     ok.
 5451: 
 5452: 
 5453: init_crypto(Node) ->
 5454:     ok = load_crypto(Node),
 5455:     ok = start_crypto(Node),
 5456:     ok.
 5457: 
 5458: fin_crypto(Node) ->
 5459:     ok = stop_crypto(Node),
 5460:     ok.
 5461: 
 5462: 
 5463: %% -- Misc application wrapper functions --
 5464: 
 5465: load_app(Node, App) ->
 5466:     VerifySuccess = fun(ok) ->
 5467: 			    ok;
 5468: 		       ({error, {already_loaded, LoadedApp}}) when (LoadedApp =:= App) ->
 5469: 			    ok;
 5470: 		       ({error, Reason}) ->
 5471: 			    ?EPRINT("failed loading app ~w on ~p: "
 5472:                                     "~n      ~p", [App, Node, Reason]),
 5473: 			    ?FAIL({failed_load, Node, App, Reason})
 5474: 		    end,
 5475:     do_load_app(Node, App, VerifySuccess).
 5476: 
 5477: do_load_app(Node, App, VerifySuccess) 
 5478:   when (Node =:= node()) andalso is_atom(App) ->
 5479:     %% Local app
 5480:     exec(fun() -> application:load(App) end, VerifySuccess);
 5481: do_load_app(Node, App, VerifySuccess) ->
 5482:     %% Remote app
 5483:     exec(fun() -> rcall(Node, application, load, [App]) end, VerifySuccess).
 5484: 
 5485: 
 5486: start_app(Node, App) ->
 5487:     VerifySuccess = fun(ok) ->
 5488: 			    ok;
 5489: 		       ({error, {already_started, LoadedApp}}) when (LoadedApp =:= App) ->
 5490: 			    ok;
 5491: 		       ({error, Reason}) ->
 5492: 			    ?EPRINT("failed starting app ~w on ~p: "
 5493:                                     "~n   Reason: ~p", [App, Node, Reason]),
 5494: 			    ?FAIL({failed_start, Node, App, Reason})
 5495: 		    end,
 5496:     start_app(Node, App, VerifySuccess).
 5497: 
 5498: start_app(Node, App, VerifySuccess) 
 5499:   when (Node =:= node()) andalso is_atom(App) ->
 5500:     exec(fun() -> application:start(App) end, VerifySuccess);
 5501: start_app(Node, App, VerifySuccess) ->
 5502:     exec(fun() -> rcall(Node, application, start, [App]) end, VerifySuccess).
 5503: 
 5504: 
 5505: stop_app(Node, App) ->
 5506:     VerifySuccess = fun(ok) ->
 5507: 			    ok;
 5508: 		       ({error, {not_started, LoadedApp}}) when (LoadedApp =:= App) ->
 5509: 			    ok;
 5510: 		       ({error, Reason}) ->
 5511: 			    ?EPRINT("failed stopping app ~w on ~p: "
 5512:                                     "~n      ~p", [App, Node, Reason]),
 5513: 			    ?FAIL({failed_stop, Node, App, Reason})
 5514: 		    end,
 5515:     stop_app(Node, App, VerifySuccess).
 5516:     
 5517: stop_app(Node, App, VerifySuccess) 
 5518:   when (Node =:= node()) andalso is_atom(App)  ->
 5519:     exec(fun() -> application:stop(App) end, VerifySuccess);
 5520: stop_app(Node, App, VerifySuccess) when is_atom(App) ->
 5521:     exec(fun() -> rcall(Node, application, stop, [App]) end, VerifySuccess).
 5522: 
 5523: 
 5524: set_app_env(Node, App, Key, Val) ->
 5525:     VerifySuccess = fun(ok) ->
 5526: 			    ok;
 5527: 		       ({error, Reason}) ->
 5528: 			    ?EPRINT("failed setting app ~w env on ~p"
 5529:                                     "~n      Key:    ~p"
 5530:                                     "~n      Val:    ~p"
 5531:                                     "~n      Reason: ~p",
 5532:                                     [App, Node, Key, Val, Reason]),
 5533: 			    ?FAIL({failed_set_app_env, 
 5534: 				   Node, App, Key, Val, Reason})
 5535: 		    end,
 5536:     set_app_env(Node, App, Key, Val, VerifySuccess).
 5537: 
 5538: set_app_env(Node, App, Key, Val, VerifySuccess) 
 5539:   when (Node =:= node()) andalso is_atom(App) ->
 5540:     exec(fun() -> application:set_env(App, Key, Val) end, VerifySuccess);
 5541: set_app_env(Node, App, Key, Val, VerifySuccess) when is_atom(App) ->
 5542:     exec(fun() -> rcall(Node, application, set_env, [App, Key, Val]) end, 
 5543: 	 VerifySuccess).
 5544: 
 5545: 
 5546: exec(Cmd, VerifySuccess) ->
 5547:     VerifySuccess(Cmd()).
 5548:

 5630: 
 5631: create_tables(Node) ->
 5632:     Tab1 = [{name,       friendsTable2},
 5633: 	    {ram_copies, [Node]},
 5634: 	    {snmp,       [{key, integer}]},
 5635: 	    {attributes, [a1,a2,a3]}],
 5636:     Tab2 = [{name,       kompissTable2},
 5637: 	    {ram_copies, [Node]},
 5638: 	    {snmp,       [{key, integer}]},
 5639: 	    {attributes, [a1,a2,a3]}],
 5640:     Tab3 = [{name,       snmp_variables},
 5641: 	    {attributes, [a1,a2]}],
 5642:     Tabs = [Tab1, Tab2, Tab3],
 5643:     create_tables(Node, Tabs).
 5644: 
 5645: create_tables(_Node, []) ->
 5646:     ok;
 5647: create_tables(Node, [Tab|Tabs]) ->
 5648:     case create_table(Node, Tab) of
 5649: 	{atomic, ok} ->
 5650: 	    create_tables(Node, Tabs);
 5651: 	Error ->
 5652: 	    ?FAIL({failed_creating_table, Node, Tab, Error})
 5653:     end.
 5654: 
 5655: delete_tables(Node) ->
 5656:     Tabs = [friendsTable2, kompissTable2, snmp_variables],
 5657:     delete_tables(Node, Tabs).
 5658: 
 5659: %% delete_mib_storage_tables(Node) ->
 5660: %%     Tabs = [snmpa_mib_data, snmpa_mib_tree, snmpa_symbolic_store],
 5661: %%     delete_tables(Node, Tabs).
 5662: 
 5663: delete_tables(Node, Tabs) ->
 5664:     lists:foreach(fun(Tab) -> delete_table(Node, Tab) end, Tabs).

 5669: init_mgr_user(Conf) ->
 5670:     ?IPRINT("init_mgr_user -> entry with"
 5671:             "~n   Conf: ~p", [Conf]),
 5672: 
 5673:     Node   = ?config(manager_node, Conf),
 5674:     %% UserId = ?config(user_id, Conf),
 5675: 
 5676:     {ok, User} = mgr_user_start(Node),
 5677:     ?DBG("start_mgr_user -> User: ~p", [User]),
 5678:     link(User),
 5679:     
 5680:     [{user_pid, User} | Conf].
 5681: 
 5682: init_mgr_v3_user(Conf) ->
 5683:     ?IPRINT("init_mgr_v3_user -> entry with"
 5684:             "~n   Conf: ~p", [Conf]),
 5685: 
 5686:     Node   = ?config(manager_node, Conf),
 5687:     %% UserId = ?config(user_id, Conf),
 5688: 
 5689:     {ok, User} = mgr_user_start(Node),
 5690:     ?IPRINT("start_mgr_v3_user -> User: ~p", [User]),
 5691:     link(User),
 5692: 
 5693:     EngineID    = "agentEngine",
 5694:     AuthAlg     = ?config(auth_alg, Conf),
 5695:     SecName     = select_secname_from_authalg(AuthAlg),% "authSHA224",
 5696:     AuthKey     = select_authkey_from_authalg(AuthAlg),% "passwd_sha224xxxxxxxxxxxxxxx",
 5697:     Credentials =
 5698:       [ {auth,     select_auth_proto(AuthAlg)},
 5699:         {auth_key, AuthKey}
 5700:       ],
 5701:     ok = mgr_register_usm_user(Node, EngineID, SecName, Credentials),
 5702:     
 5703:     ?IPRINT("start_mgr_v3_user -> done"),
 5704:     [{user_pid, User} | Conf].
 5705: 
 5706: select_secname_from_authalg(md5) ->
 5707:     "authMD5";
 5708: select_secname_from_authalg(sha) ->
 5709:     "authSHA";
 5710: select_secname_from_authalg(sha224) ->
 5711:     "authSHA224";
 5712: select_secname_from_authalg(sha256) ->
 5713:     "authSHA256";
 5714: select_secname_from_authalg(sha384) ->
 5715:     "authSHA384";
 5716: select_secname_from_authalg(sha512) ->
 5717:     "authSHA512".
 5718: 
 5719: select_authkey_from_authalg(md5) ->
 5720:     "passwd_md5xxxxxx";
 5721: select_authkey_from_authalg(sha) ->
 5722:     "passwd_shaxxxxxxxxxx";
 5723: select_authkey_from_authalg(sha224) ->
 5724:     "passwd_sha224xxxxxxxxxxxxxxx";
 5725: select_authkey_from_authalg(sha256) ->
 5726:     "passwd_sha256xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx";
 5727: select_authkey_from_authalg(sha384) ->
 5728:     "passwd_sha384xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx";
 5729: select_authkey_from_authalg(sha512) ->
 5730:     "passwd_sha512xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx".
 5731:

 5740: init_mgr_user_data1(Conf) ->
 5741:     ?DBG("init_mgr_user_data1 -> entry with"
 5742: 	 "~n   Conf: ~p", [Conf]),
 5743:     Node = ?config(manager_node, Conf),
 5744:     TargetName = ?config(manager_agent_target_name, Conf),
 5745:     IpFamily   = ?config(ipfamily, Conf),
 5746:     Ip         = ?config(ip, Conf),
 5747:     Port       = ?AGENT_PORT,
 5748:     ok =
 5749: 	case IpFamily of
 5750: 	    inet ->
 5751:                 mgr_user_register_agent(
 5752:                   Node, TargetName,
 5753:                   [{address,   Ip},
 5754:                    {port,      Port},
 5755:                    {engine_id, "agentEngine"}]);
 5756: 	    inet6 ->
 5757: 		mgr_user_register_agent(
 5758: 		  Node, TargetName,
 5759: 		  [{tdomain,   transportDomainUdpIpv6},
 5760: 		   {taddress,  {Ip, Port}},
 5761: 		   {engine_id, "agentEngine"}])
 5762: 	end,
 5763:     _Agents = mgr_user_which_own_agents(Node),
 5764:     ?DBG("Own agents: ~p", [_Agents]),
 5765: 
 5766:     {ok, _DefAgentConf} = mgr_user_agent_info(Node, TargetName, all),
 5767:     ?DBG("Default agent config: ~n~p", [_DefAgentConf]),
 5768: 
 5769:     ok = mgr_user_update_agent_info(Node, TargetName,
 5770: 					  community, "all-rights"),
 5771:     ok = mgr_user_update_agent_info(Node, TargetName,
 5772: 					  sec_name, "all-rights"),
 5773:     ok = mgr_user_update_agent_info(Node, TargetName,
 5774: 					  engine_id, "agentEngine"),
 5775:     ok = mgr_user_update_agent_info(Node, TargetName,
 5776: 					  max_message_size, 1024),
 5777: 
 5778:     {ok, _AgentConf} = mgr_user_agent_info(Node, TargetName, all),
 5779:     ?DBG("Updated agent config: ~n~p", [_AgentConf]),
 5780:     Conf.
 5781:

 5953: %% -- Misc manager wrapper functions --
 5954: 
 5955: start_manager(Node, Vsns, Config) ->
 5956:     start_manager(Node, Vsns, Config, []).
 5957: start_manager(Node, Vsns, Conf0, _Opts) ->
 5958: 
 5959:     ?IPRINT("start_manager -> entry with"
 5960:             "~n   Node:   ~p"
 5961:             "~n   Vsns:   ~p"
 5962:             "~n   Conf0:  ~p"
 5963:             "~n   Opts:   ~p", [Node, Vsns, Conf0, _Opts]),
 5964: 
 5965:     SCO     = ?config(socket_create_opts, Conf0),
 5966: 
 5967:     AtlDir  = ?config(manager_log_dir,    Conf0),
 5968:     ConfDir = ?config(manager_conf_dir,   Conf0),
 5969:     DbDir   = ?config(manager_db_dir,     Conf0),
 5970:     IRB     = ?config(irb,                Conf0),
 5971: 
 5972:     ConfigVerbosity    = get_opt(manager_config_verbosity,     Conf0, trace),
 5973:     NoteStoreVerbosity = get_opt(manager_note_store_verbosity, Conf0, log),
 5974:     NetIfVerbosity     = get_opt(manager_net_if_verbosity,     Conf0, trace),
 5975: 
 5976:     AtlSeqNo           = get_opt(manager_atl_seqno,            Conf0, false),
 5977: 
 5978:     ServerVerbosity    = get_opt(manager_server_verbosity,     Conf0, trace),
 5979:     CBP                = get_opt(manager_server_cbproxy,       Conf0, temporary),
 5980:     NIS                = get_opt(manager_server_nis,           Conf0, none),
 5981: 
 5982:     NetIfConf = 
 5983: 	case get_opt(manager_net_if_module, Conf0, no_module) of
 5984: 	    no_module ->
 5985: 		[{verbosity, NetIfVerbosity},
 5986:                  {options,   SCO}];
 5987: 	    NetIfModule ->
 5988: 		[{module,    NetIfModule}, 
 5989: 		 {verbosity, NetIfVerbosity},
 5990:                  {options,   SCO}]
 5991: 	end,
 5992: 
 5993:     Env = [{versions,                 Vsns},
 5994: 	   {inform_request_behaviour, IRB},
 5995: 	   {audit_trail_log,          [{type,      read_write},
 5996:                                        {dir,       AtlDir},
 5997:                                        {size,      {10240, 10}},
 5998:                                        {repair,    true},
 5999:                                        {seqno,     AtlSeqNo}]},
 6000: 	   {config,                   [{dir,       ConfDir}, 
 6001:                                        {db_dir,    DbDir}, 
 6002:                                        {verbosity, ConfigVerbosity}]},
 6003: 	   {note_store,               [{verbosity, NoteStoreVerbosity}]},
 6004: 	   {server,                   [{verbosity, ServerVerbosity},
 6005:                                        {cbproxy,   CBP},
 6006:                                        {netif_sup, NIS}]},
 6007: 	   {net_if,                   NetIfConf}],
 6008:     ok = set_mgr_env(Node, Env),
 6009: 
 6010:     ok = try start_snmp(Node) of
 6011: 		   ok ->
 6012: 		       ok;
 6013: 		   {error, Reason} ->
 6014: 		       ?FAIL({failed_start_manager, Reason})
 6015: 	       catch
 6016: 		   exit:{suite_failed, {failed_start, _, _, Reason}, _M, _L}:_ ->
 6017: 		       ?FAIL({failed_start_manager, Reason});
 6018:                    C:E:S ->
 6019:                        erlang:raise(C, E, S)
 6020: 	       end,
 6021:     Conf0.
 6022: 
 6023: stop_manager(Node) ->
 6024:     stop_snmp(Node).
 6025: 
 6026: 
 6027: %% -- Misc agent wrapper functions --
 6028: 
 6029: start_agent(Node, Vsns, Config) ->
 6030:     start_agent(Node, Vsns, Config, []).
 6031: start_agent(Node, Vsns, Conf0, _Opts) ->
 6032:     ?DBG("start_agent -> entry with"
 6033: 	 "~n   Node:   ~p"
 6034: 	 "~n   Vsns:   ~p"
 6035: 	 "~n   Conf0:  ~p"
 6036: 	 "~n   Opts:   ~p", [Node, Vsns, Conf0, _Opts]),
 6037:     
 6038:     AtlDir  = ?config(agent_log_dir,  Conf0),
 6039:     ConfDir = ?config(agent_conf_dir, Conf0),
 6040:     DbDir   = ?config(agent_db_dir,   Conf0),
 6041: 
 6042:     MAV  = get_opt(agent_verbosity,                Conf0, trace),
 6043:     CV   = get_opt(agent_config_verbosity,         Conf0, info),
 6044:     LDBV = get_opt(agent_local_db_verbosity,       Conf0, info),
 6045:     MSV  = get_opt(agent_mib_server_verbosity,     Conf0, info),
 6046:     NSV  = get_opt(agent_note_store_verbosity,     Conf0, info),
 6047:     SSV  = get_opt(agent_symbolic_store_verbosity, Conf0, info),
 6048:     %% NIV  = get_opt(agent_net_if_verbosity,         Conf0, log),
 6049:     NIV  = get_opt(agent_net_if_verbosity,         Conf0, trace),
 6050: 
 6051:     Env = [{versions,        Vsns},
 6052: 	   {type,            master},
 6053: 	   {agent_verbosity, MAV},
 6054: 	   {audit_trail_log, [{type,   read_write},
 6055: 			      {dir,    AtlDir},
 6056: 			      {size,   {10240, 10}},
 6057: 			      {repair, true}]},
 6058: 	   {config,          [{dir,        ConfDir}, 
 6059: 			      {force_load, false}, 
 6060: 			      {verbosity,  CV}]},
 6061: 	   {db_dir,          DbDir},
 6062: 	   {local_db,        [{repair,    true},
 6063: 			      {auto_save, 10000},
 6064: 			      {verbosity, LDBV}]},
 6065: 	   {mib_server,      [{verbosity, MSV}]},
 6066: 	   {note_store,      [{verbosity, NSV}]},
 6067: 	   {stymbolic_store, [{verbosity, SSV}]},
 6068: 	   {net_if,          [{verbosity, NIV},
 6069:                               %% On some linux "they" add a 127.0.1.1 or something
 6070:                               %% similar, so if we don't specify bind_to
 6071:                               %% we don't know which address will be selected
 6072:                               %% (which will cause problems for some test cases).
 6073:                               {options, [{bind_to, true}]}]},
 6074: 	   {multi_threaded,  true}],
 6075:     ok = set_agent_env(Node, Env),
 6076: 
 6077:     try start_snmp(Node) of
 6078: 	      ok ->
 6079: 		  ok;
 6080: 	      {error, Reason} ->
 6081: 		  ?FAIL({failed_start_agent, Reason})
 6082: 	  catch
 6083: 	      exit:{suite_failed, {failed_start, _, _, Reason}, _M, _L}:_ ->
 6084: 		  ?FAIL({failed_start_agent, Reason});
 6085:               C:E:S ->
 6086: 		  erlang:raise(C, E, S)
 6087: 	  end,
 6088:     Conf0.
 6089: 
 6090: stop_agent(Node) ->
 6091:     stop_snmp(Node).
 6092:

 6094:     rcall(Node, snmpa, load_mibs, [[Mib]]).

 6096: agent_send_trap(Node, Trap, Community, VBs) ->
 6097:     Args = [snmp_master_agent, Trap, Community, VBs],
 6098:     rcall(Node, snmpa, send_trap, Args).
 6099:

 6101:     agent_send_notif(Node, Trap, Name, []).
 6102:

 6104:     agent_send_notif(Node, Trap, no_receiver, Name, VBs).
 6105: 
 6106: agent_send_notif(Node, Trap, Recv, Name, VBs) ->
 6107:     Args = [snmp_master_agent, Trap, Recv, Name, VBs],
 6108:     rcall(Node, snmpa, send_notification, Args).

 6110: agent_info(Node) ->
 6111:     rcall(Node, snmpa, info, []).

 6114: %% -- Misc node operation wrapper functions --
 6115: 
 6116: start_node(Case) ->
 6117:     Args = ["-s", "snmp_test_sys_monitor", "start", "-s", "global", "sync"],
 6118:     Name = peer:random_name(lists:concat([?MODULE, "-", Case])),
 6119:     {ok, Peer, Node}  = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Name, args => Args}),
 6120:     global:sync(),
 6121:     {Peer, Node}.

 6123: %% -- Misc config wrapper functions --
 6124: 
 6125: write_manager_config(Config) ->
 6126:     write_manager_config(default, Config).
 6127: 
 6128: write_manager_config(DomainType, Config) ->
 6129:     Dir = ?config(manager_conf_dir, Config),
 6130:     Ip  = tuple_to_list(?config(ip, Config)),
 6131:     case ?config(ipfamily, Config) of
 6132:         inet when (DomainType =:= default) ->
 6133:             snmp_config:write_manager_snmp_files(
 6134:               Dir, Ip, ?MGR_PORT, ?MGR_MMS, ?MGR_ENGINE_ID);
 6135:         inet ->
 6136:             TDomain    = transportDomainUdpIpv4,
 6137:             TAddr      = {Ip, ?MGR_PORT},
 6138:             Transport  = {TDomain, TAddr},
 6139:             Transports = [Transport],
 6140:             snmp_config:write_manager_snmp_files(
 6141:               Dir, Transports, ?MGR_MMS, ?MGR_ENGINE_ID);
 6142:         inet6 ->
 6143:             TDomain    = transportDomainUdpIpv6,
 6144:             TAddr      = {Ip, ?MGR_PORT},
 6145:             Transport  = {TDomain, TAddr},
 6146:             Transports = [Transport],
 6147:             snmp_config:write_manager_snmp_files(
 6148:               Dir, Transports, ?MGR_MMS, ?MGR_ENGINE_ID)
 6149:     end.
 6150: 
 6151: write_manager_conf(Dir) ->
 6152:     LocalHost = snmp_test_lib:localhost(), 
 6153:     TDomain   =
 6154:         if
 6155:             is_tuple(LocalHost) ->
 6156:                 if
 6157:                     tuple_size(LocalHost) =:= 4 ->
 6158:                         transportDomainUdpIpv4;
 6159:                     tuple_size(LocalHost) =:= 8 ->
 6160:                         transportDomainUdpIpv6
 6161:                 end
 6162:         end,
 6163:     Port = 5000,
 6164:     MMS  = 484,
 6165:     EngineID = "\"mgrEngine\"",
 6166:     Str = lists:flatten(
 6167:             io_lib:format("%% Minimum manager config file\n"
 6168:                           "{transports,       [{~w, {~w, ~w}}]}.\n"
 6169:                           "{max_message_size, ~w}.\n"
 6170:                           "{engine_id,        ~s}.\n",
 6171:                           [TDomain, LocalHost, Port, MMS, EngineID])),
 6172:     write_manager_conf(Dir, Str).
 6173: 
 6174: write_manager_conf(Dir, Str) ->
 6175:     write_conf_file(Dir, "manager.conf", Str).
 6176: 
 6177: 
 6178: write_agent_config(Vsns, Conf) ->
 6179:     Dir = ?config(agent_conf_dir, Conf),
 6180:     Ip  = tuple_to_list(?config(ip, Conf)),
 6181:     Domain =
 6182: 	case ?config(ipfamily, Conf) of
 6183: 	    inet ->
 6184: 		transportDomainUdpIpv4;
 6185: 	    inet6 ->
 6186: 		transportDomainUdpIpv6
 6187: 	end,
 6188:     ok = write_agent_config_files(Dir, Vsns, Domain, Ip),
 6189:     ok = update_agent_usm(Vsns, Dir),
 6190:     ok = update_agent_community(Vsns, Dir),
 6191:     ok = update_agent_vacm(Vsns, Dir),
 6192:     ok = write_agent_target_addr_conf(Dir, Domain, Ip, Vsns),
 6193:     ok = write_agent_target_params_conf(Dir, Vsns),
 6194:     ok = write_agent_notify_conf(Dir),
 6195:     ok.
 6196:     
 6197: write_agent_config_files(Dir, Vsns, Domain, Ip) ->
 6198:     snmp_config:write_agent_snmp_files(
 6199:       Dir, Vsns, Domain, {Ip, ?MGR_PORT}, {Ip, ?AGENT_PORT}, "mgr-test",
 6200:       trap, none, "", ?AGENT_ENGINE_ID, ?AGENT_MMS).
 6201:

 6299: update_agent_community([v3], _Dir) -> 
 6300:     ok;
 6301: update_agent_community(_, Dir) ->
 6302:     Conf = [{"no-rights", "no-rights", "no-rights", "", ""}],
 6303:     snmp_config:update_agent_community_config(Dir, Conf).
 6304: 
 6305: update_agent_vacm(_Vsns, Dir) ->
 6306:     Conf = [{vacmSecurityToGroup, usm, "authMD5",    "initial"}, 
 6307:             {vacmSecurityToGroup, usm, "authSHA",    "initial"}, 
 6308:             {vacmSecurityToGroup, usm, "authSHA224", "initial"}, 
 6309:             {vacmSecurityToGroup, usm, "authSHA256", "initial"}, 
 6310:             {vacmSecurityToGroup, usm, "authSHA384", "initial"}, 
 6311:             {vacmSecurityToGroup, usm, "authSHA512", "initial"}, 
 6312:             {vacmSecurityToGroup, usm, "privDES",    "initial"}, 
 6313:             {vacmSecurityToGroup, usm, "newUser",    "initial"},
 6314:             {vacmViewTreeFamily, "internet", ?tDescr_instance, 
 6315:              excluded, null}],
 6316:     snmp_config:update_agent_vacm_config(Dir, Conf).
 6317: 
 6318: write_agent_target_addr_conf(Dir, Domain, Ip, Vsns) ->
 6319:     snmp_config:write_agent_snmp_target_addr_conf(
 6320:       Dir, Domain, {Ip, ?MGR_PORT}, 300, 3, Vsns).
 6321: 
 6322: write_agent_target_params_conf(Dir, Vsns) -> 
 6323:     F = fun(v1) -> {"target_v1", v1,  v1,  "all-rights", noAuthNoPriv};
 6324:            (v2) -> {"target_v2", v2c, v2c, "all-rights", noAuthNoPriv};
 6325:            (v3) -> {"target_v3", v3,  usm, "all-rights", noAuthNoPriv}
 6326:         end,
 6327:     Conf = [F(Vsn) || Vsn <- Vsns],
 6328:     snmp_config:write_agent_target_params_config(Dir, "", Conf).
 6329: 
 6330: write_agent_notify_conf(Dir) -> 
 6331:     Conf = [{"standard trap",   "std_trap",   trap}, 
 6332:             {"standard inform", "std_inform", inform}],
 6333:     snmp_config:write_agent_notify_config(Dir, "", Conf).
 6334: 
 6335: 
 6336: write_conf_file(Dir, File, Str) ->
 6337:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(filename:join(Dir, File), write),
 6338:     ok = io:format(Fd, "~s", [Str]),
 6339:     file:close(Fd).

 6342: %% ------
 6343: 
 6344: display_log(Config) ->
 6345:     case lists:keysearch(manager_log_dir, 1, Config) of
 6346: 	{value, {_, Dir}} ->
 6347: 	    case lists:keysearch(manager_node, 1, Config) of
 6348: 		{value, {_, Node}} ->
 6349: 		    LogDir  = Dir, 
 6350: 		    Mibs    = [], 
 6351: 		    OutFile = j(LogDir, "snmpm_log.txt"), 
 6352: 		    ?IPRINT("~n"
 6353:                             "========================="
 6354:                             "  < Audit Trail Log >  "
 6355:                             "========================="
 6356:                             "~n"),
 6357: 		    rcall(Node, snmpm, log_to_txt, [LogDir, Mibs, OutFile]),
 6358: 		    rcall(Node, snmpm, log_to_io, [LogDir, Mibs]),
 6359: 		    ?IPRINT("~n"
 6360:                             "========================="
 6361:                             " < / Audit Trail Log > "
 6362:                             "========================="
 6363:                             "~n");
 6364: 		false ->
 6365: 		    ?IPRINT("display_log -> no manager node found"),
 6366: 		    ok
 6367: 	    end;
 6368: 	false ->
 6369: 	    ?IPRINT("display_log -> no manager log dir found"),
 6370: 	    ok
 6371:     end.

 6407: %% ------
 6408: 
 6409: rcall(Node, Mod, Func, Args) when (Node =:= self()) ->
 6410:     apply(Mod, Func, Args);
 6411: rcall(Node, Mod, Func, Args) ->
 6412:     case rpc:call(Node, Mod, Func, Args) of
 6413: 	{badrpc, nodedown} ->
 6414: 	    ?FAIL({rpc_failure, Node});
 6415: 	Else ->
 6416: 	    Else
 6417:     end.

 6422: ipv6_init(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6423:     [{ipfamily, inet6} | Config].
